alert.note: Alert for Grand and Battlement Mesas; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 02 at 3:23PM MDT until April 04 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM MONDAY TO 9 PM MDT TUESDAY ABOVE 9000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 9000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts up to 16 inches possible. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Grand and Battlement Mesas and West Elk and Sawatch Mountains. * WHEN...From 3 PM Monday to 9 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Grand and Battlement Mesas; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
